QuestData.Title: Wrecking the Wreck
QuestData.Description: To dislodge the alliance ship, we need to find our engineer. He parted ways with us when we were escaping the wreckage.$B$BYou should be able to find him somewhere in the western forest. Tell him Korga sent you and he'll get in line to help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Makael Bay in the Pei-Wu Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Korga sent you, eh? Well, I wouldn't mind doing a number on that ship for my own reasons anyway, but it's going to take some work.$B$BGive me a moment to think...
